mdRecord.dcterms:title: Bounaparte's coronation: & favorite marches for the piano forte
Bounaparte's favorite march
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gillingham, Edwin. [engraver]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: No. 1. Bounaparte's coronation -- No. 2. Bounatparte's favorite march.
Caption title; the 2 marches are separately captioned. [original]
George Willig was at this address between 1819 and 1853. Cf. Handbook of early American sheet music / Dichter and Shapiro. Publication date inferred from plate number. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Twelfth title in a bound volume of sheet music from the library of Mrs. Abby A. Waterhouse, with her name on the cover. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Dealer's stamp: Harrold & Murray, 177 Broad St., Richmond. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Napoleon, I, Emperor of the French, 1769-1821--Songs and music
Marches (Piano)
Piano music
